item.title: Ellyn add a quote by Russell Baker
item.description: "The only thing I was fit for was to be a writer, and this notion rested solely on my suspicion that I would never be fit for real work, and that writing didn't require any." -- Russell Baker

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "Afoot and lighthearted I take to the open road, healthy, free, the world before me." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by Jhumpa Lahiri
item.description: "Still, there are times I am bewildered by each mile I have traveled, each meal I have eaten, each person I have known, each room in which I have slept. As ordinary as it all appears, there are times when it is beyond my imagination." -- Jhumpa Lahiri

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I'm the most terrific liar you ever saw in your life. It's awful. If I'm on my way to the store to buy a magazine, even, and somebody asks me where I'm going, I'm liable to say I'm going to the opera. It's terrible." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "It's everybody, I mean. Everything everybody does is so — I don't know — not wrong, or even mean, or even stupid necessarily. But just so tiny and meaningless and — sad-making. And the worst part is, if you go bohemian or something crazy like that, you're conforming just as much only in a different way." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by Nicole Krauss
item.description: "Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering." -- Nicole Krauss

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "There is only one page left to write on. I will fill it with words of only one syllable. I love. I have loved. I will love." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Don't you think it's better to be extremely happy for a short while, even if you lose it, than to be just okay for your whole life?" -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "Any God I ever found in church, I brought in myself." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Things are so hard to figure out when you live from day to day in this feverish and silly world. " -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Ellyn add a quote by Gabriel Garcia Marquez
item.description: "She felt the abyss of disenchantment." -- Gabriel Garcia Marquez
